interestgroupdescription: Get ahead in your Civil Engineering career by joining GTech Î¼learn's Civil Interest Group. Learn AutoCAD, BIM, and Revit from industry experts. Gain hands-on experience and practical skills. Join us now to take the next step in your career.

coretracks.description: Autodesk's Revit is a well-known Building Information Modeling (BIM) programme. It is commonly used to produce intricate 3D models of buildings and other structures in the design, engineering, and construction industries.
coretracks.name: Autodesk Revit

coretracks.description: AutoCAD is a powerful computer-aided design software application. It is widely used in architectural, engineering, construction, and manufacturing fields. AutoCAD is known for its precision, accuracy, and easy-to-use features. It offers a range of tools that enable users to create highly detailed and complex designs.
coretracks.name: AutoCAD
